channel.title: Astrology.com Daily Overview
channel.description: Get free Horoscopes and Astrology from Astrology.com.

item.title: Aries Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
It's a good day for you to meet new people. Things are great for you socially, and you may find that you're in the middle of something that's much bigger than you had realized at first.

More horoscopes! Check your Daily Single's LoveScopes, Daily Couple's LoveScopes, Daily CareerScopes, Weekly RomanticScopes, Monthly FitnessScopes, more...

item.title: Taurus Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
Your subconscious mind is a little hyperactive right now, but that's not such a bad thing. In fact, if you can get behind the odd spooks and weird emotions, you should find your intuitions strong and clear.

item.title: Gemini Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
You and a coworker or neighbor -- one who rarely agrees with you -- are on the same wavelength today. It's a great time for you to move forward on some project that means a lot to both of you.

item.title: Cancer Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
Coworkers need your help today -- even if you're miles from the office. It's one of those times when you can make a huge difference just by checking in. They are sure to think you're a mind reader!

item.title: Leo Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
You don't mind change so much -- in fact, boredom can be a real problem for you -- so you're likely to embrace today's big news without thinking too hard about it. Go for it, as your good energy needs this shift.

item.title: Virgo Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
You need to stay disciplined today, which usually isn't so hard for you. Today, though, you may find that you're having a much harder time, so fall back on your huger conscience and let it be your guide.

item.title: Libra Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
All that brain power has to be good for something, right? See if you can get your family or colleagues to help you dream up new ideas for the future, as you should be able to get them on your side.

item.title: Scorpio Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
If something seems too good to be true today, it probably is. See if you can get your skeptical side to take over -- it should help you figure out what you really need to do next. Think it over first.

item.title: Sagittarius Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
Poke around a little and see if you can dig up any solid info -- or new faces or even just a new place to hang out and make your own. Your great energy helps you explore the world in a brand-new way.

item.title: Capricorn Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
You've got an idealistic streak, and it shows itself at full strength today. You might need to shoot down a proposal that has ethical ramifications that only you can see, but you can be quite persuasive

item.title: Aquarius Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
You don't have to spend much energy to make people feel welcome today -- and they are sure to remember you for it for quite some time to come. It's a great time to make introductions, too.

item.title: Pisces Daily Overview for May 29, 2017
item.description:
Work issues are hard to deal with now, but don't let them get the better of you. As long as you can still think and move, you can deal with whatever crisis comes up today. Count on colleagues in the crunch.
